author: jleroux
msg: When working with the POS I often need to use it in conjunction with back-end and sometimes even eCommerce.
This Windows batch file and container configurations just allow that.
I did not care to write scripts for Linux yet because I do not have any needs.
I will certainly later if nobody has done it before...

author: mfreedman
msg: Fixes problems with last checkin -- when I added the new subdirs I needed to update these files to reference the new test beans.
